mapper.sql: USERS_ID, LOGIN_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, PRIMARY_IP, PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID, DATE_REGISTERED, EMAIL_ADDRESS, LAST_LOGIN, PERSONAL_TEXT, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, USER_TITLE, HIDE_EMAIL_FLAG, HIDE_AGE_FLAG, HIDE_GENDER_FLAG, HIDE_BIRTH_DATE_FLAG, TIME_OFFSET, TIME_ZONE, SKYPE, AIM, YIM, GTALK, STEAM, NNID, XBOX_LIVE, PSN, HIDE_SKYPE_FLAG, HIDE_AIM_FLAG, HIDE_YIM_FLAG, HIDE_GTALK_FLAG, HIDE_STEAM_FLAG, HIDE_NNID_FLAG, HIDE_XBOX_LIVE_FLAG, HIDE_PSN_FLAG

select
distinct
from USER_PROFILE_VIEW
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into USER_PROFILE_VIEW (USERS_ID, LOGIN_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, PRIMARY_IP, PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID, DATE_REGISTERED, EMAIL_ADDRESS, LAST_LOGIN, PERSONAL_TEXT, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, USER_TITLE, HIDE_EMAIL_FLAG, HIDE_AGE_FLAG, HIDE_GENDER_FLAG, HIDE_BIRTH_DATE_FLAG, TIME_OFFSET, TIME_ZONE, SKYPE, AIM, YIM, GTALK, STEAM, NNID, XBOX_LIVE, PSN, HIDE_SKYPE_FLAG, HIDE_AIM_FLAG, HIDE_YIM_FLAG, HIDE_GTALK_FLAG, HIDE_STEAM_FLAG, HIDE_NNID_FLAG, HIDE_XBOX_LIVE_FLAG, HIDE_PSN_FLAG ) values (#{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hideEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideAgeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideGenderFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideBirthDateFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gtalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{steam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xboxLive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hideSkypeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideAimFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideYimFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideGtalkFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideSteamFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideNnidFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideXboxLiveFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hidePsnFlag,jdbcType=BIT} )

mapper.update:
update USER_PROFILE_VIEW
USERS_ID = #{record.usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOGIN_NAME = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{record.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIMARY_IP = #{record.primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID = #{record.primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATE_REGISTERED = #{record.dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{record.emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN = #{record.lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PERSONAL_TEXT = #{record.personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{record.gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
BIRTH_DATE = #{record.birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_TITLE = #{record.userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIDE_EMAIL_FLAG = #{record.hideEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_AGE_FLAG = #{record.hideAgeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_GENDER_FLAG = #{record.hideGenderFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_BIRTH_DATE_FLAG = #{record.hideBirthDateFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TIME_OFFSET = #{record.timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
TIME_ZONE = #{record.timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKYPE = #{record.skype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AIM = #{record.aim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YIM = #{record.yim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GTALK = #{record.gtalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEAM = #{record.steam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NNID = #{record.nnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XBOX_LIVE = #{record.xboxLive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSN = #{record.psn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIDE_SKYPE_FLAG = #{record.hideSkypeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_AIM_FLAG = #{record.hideAimFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_YIM_FLAG = #{record.hideYimFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_GTALK_FLAG = #{record.hideGtalkFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_STEAM_FLAG = #{record.hideSteamFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_NNID_FLAG = #{record.hideNnidFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_XBOX_LIVE_FLAG = #{record.hideXboxLiveFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_PSN_FLAG = #{record.hidePsnFlag,jdbcType=BIT},

update USER_PROFILE_VIEW set USERS_ID = #{record.usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOGIN_NAME = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_NAME = #{record.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIMARY_IP = #{record.primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID = #{record.primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATE_REGISTERED = #{record.dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{record.emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_LOGIN = #{record.lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERSONAL_TEXT = #{record.personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{record.gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, BIRTH_DATE = #{record.birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_TITLE = #{record.userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIDE_EMAIL_FLAG = #{record.hideEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_AGE_FLAG = #{record.hideAgeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_GENDER_FLAG = #{record.hideGenderFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_BIRTH_DATE_FLAG = #{record.hideBirthDateFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, TIME_OFFSET = #{record.timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, TIME_ZONE = #{record.timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKYPE = #{record.skype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AIM = #{record.aim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YIM = #{record.yim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GTALK = #{record.gtalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STEAM = #{record.steam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NNID = #{record.nnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XBOX_LIVE = #{record.xboxLive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSN = #{record.psn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIDE_SKYPE_FLAG = #{record.hideSkypeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_AIM_FLAG = #{record.hideAimFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_YIM_FLAG = #{record.hideYimFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_GTALK_FLAG = #{record.hideGtalkFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_STEAM_FLAG = #{record.hideSteamFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_NNID_FLAG = #{record.hideNnidFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_XBOX_LIVE_FLAG = #{record.hideXboxLiveFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, HIDE_PSN_FLAG = #{record.hidePsnFlag,jdbcType=BIT}
